press_release_headline: NSF Announces $250M Cybersecurity Workforce Training Program for Veterans and Underrepresented Students
key_highlights: $250M over 5 years for cybersecurity education grants
Priority for veterans and HBCU/HSI partnerships
Addresses critical national security workforce need
quote_attribution: Secretary of Defense: 'This program strengthens our cybersecurity defense while creating economic opportunity for veterans and expanding access to high-demand careers'
disclaimer: Final release package requires final approval before public distribution. All quotes and claims must be verified.
